products.add: INSERT INTO products (price, num, specifications, notes) VALUES (@price, @num, @specifications, @notes);
products.modify: UPDATE products SET price = @price, num = @num, specifications = @specifications, notes = @notes WHERE id = @id;

users.add: INSERT INTO users (name, tel, address, notes) VALUES (@name, @tel, @address, @notes);
users.modify: UPDATE users SET name = @name, tel = @tel, address = @address, notes = @notes WHERE id = @id;
